question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn back and move forward towards the buildings till the brown building which have a glass on its top. now turn back and get closer to the blue building and get high and move forward till the pond arrives. now fly over the pond and move forward towards the road is visible. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the building have a banner named bolt cola. now move forward towards the buildings and get closer to the brown building and turn right and move forward till the road splits. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the blue building arrives and get closer to its bottom and stay there.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I am near the blue building.  
B. I fly across the pond.  
C. I turn left and head toward the building.  
D. I go back and approach the blue building.  
E. I head toward the building until a banner named "Bolt Cola" appears on the building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The sequence of images shows that the agent has followed the navigation instructions and is now near the blue building, as indicated by the close proximity to a prominent blue structure in the later frames.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(32, 47), (59, 64), (514, 524)]
Option: A
Reason: The navigation instruction is [take off and turn back and move forward towards the buildings till the brown building which have a glass on its top. now turn back and get closer to the blue building and get high and move forward till the pond arrives. now fly over the pond and move forward towards the road is visible. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the building have a banner named bolt cola. now move forward towards the buildings and get closer to the brown building and turn right and move forward till the road splits. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the blue building arrives and get closer to its bottom and stay there.]. The video shows that the agent has followed the navigation instructions and is now near the blue building, as indicated by the close proximity to a prominent blue structure in the later frames.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The sequence of images shows that the agent has followed the navigation instructions and is now near the blue building, as indicated by the close proximity to a prominent blue structure in the later frames.
